ideas.title: Moxie Marlinspike has a privacy-conscious alternative to ChatGPT
ideas.description: Confer is designed to look and feel like ChatGPT or Claude, but your conversations can't be used for training or advertising.
hooks: Privacy AI: Moxie's ChatGPT Killer Revealed
The AI That Won't Sell Your Secrets
Confer: When Privacy Meets Artificial Intelligence

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions in advance
Use multi-camera setup for dynamic visual engagement

visualDirection.description: Dark mode color palette with deep teals and electric blues. Minimalist cybersecurity-inspired motion graphics. Futuristic sans-serif typography with translucent data visualization overlays. Subtle glitch effects symbolizing privacy disruption. Clean, technical aesthetic with high-contrast design elements.

exampleOutline: Introduction: Moxie Marlinspike's Background & Privacy Philosophy
The Problem: Current AI's Data Exploitation Model

Live Q&A: Audience Privacy Questions & Demonstrations

ideas.title: Musk wants up to $134B in OpenAI lawsuit, despite $700B fortune
